class=\"content-expand-container\">\n            <div class=\"col-1\">\n                <h1>Outdoor and Country – the award winning lifestyle clothing store</h1>\n                <p>Outdoor and Country is a brilliant place to buy great British style. We are a contemporary store with a very traditional approach to looking after our customers. A place where premium British brands like <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/hunter-boots.cat\">Hunter</a>, <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/musto.cat\">Musto</a>, <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/crew-clothing.cat\">Crew</a>, <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/joules.cat\">Joules</a> and others come together with leading international brands, including <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/aigle.cat\">Aigle</a>, <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/gant.cat\">Gant</a>, <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/timberland.cat\">Timberland</a> and <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/le-chameau.cat\">Le Chameau</a>.  Our award winning customer service backs up our fantastic selection of lifestyle clothing, footwear and accessories.</p>\n\t\t<p>Our edit is designed to work perfectly for urbanites as well as country folk alike.  Our clothing looks good and will help keep you protected and comfortable in all weathers.  For men the style is classic, rugged and good looking.  For women, the order of the day is effortless, elegant and practical.  We have a long history of delighting our customers with our service.  Independent reviews and trust surveys place us right at the top and we regularly win awards for customer satisfaction.  Delighting shoppers with advice and care is just as important as having exactly the right clothes to choose from.\n\t\tOur mantra is to bring style, hope and glory to shoppers.  Put simply this means great looking clothes, beautifully put together to show you in your very best light; leaving you feeling great and well protected, no matter how fickle the weather happens to be.</p>\n\t\t<p>You can shop online or in our bricks and mortar retail stores – that’s right we are not just online, we also have some rather smashing retail stores jam packed with a wide selection of our latest products.</p>\n\t\t</div>\n            <div class=\"col-2\">\n\t\t<h2>Authorised Barbour Outlet</h2>\n                <p>As authorised stockists we are able to offer the full range of Barbour products, all backed by their legendary product guarantee.  We also have two of our very own Barbour branded retail stores, and these together with our extensive range of <a href=\"/shop-by-brand/barbour.cat\">Barbour</a> products listed online, ensure that we are able to offer the widest range of Barbour products available anywhere.</p>\n        \t<p>As we have many years of experience with the brand, our customer services team are able to adviser on all aspects of fit and sizing.  Be it questions regarding which is the correct hood or liner to fit your jacket or which collection will suit you best.  Our team is standing by to assist you, simply contact us by email, live chat or via social media.</p>\n\t\t</div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n                <div class=\"clear\"></div>\n
